main event: An airline pilot observed an oblong, fire orange object with a snake-like motion outside Breckenridge, Texas on 11 August 1958.
interesting points: The object was the size of a golf ball and exhibited motion like a snake., The sighting lasted only 2 seconds., The pilot was alerted to this sighting after hearing about several unidentified objects from another aircraft., The object went out like a light after the brief observation., Various possibilities for the object were suggested, including balloon or aircraft, but insufficient data was available for a firm conclusion.
witness description: American Airlines pilot with 27 years of experience.
